snippet.title: Centum - Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Every why has a wherefore 🐀 

Discover Centum an unreliable point-&-click adventure that's not what it seems! Confront the unknown and unravel an ever-shifting narrative when Centum launches on PC and Consoles on March 11th.

Pre-order or wishlist the game on your platform of choice today: 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2625550/Centum/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/centum-switch/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012850
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/hu-HU/games/store/centum/9n2gqkwlc0qm
Game Page: https://serenityforge.com/games/centum

Serenity Forge:
Website: https://serenityforge.com
Store Page: https://store.serenityforge.com/
X: https://twitter.com/SerenityForge
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SerenityForge
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/serenityforge
